thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian on Odom: 'Believing in the Power of Prayer'
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian on Lamar Odom: 'Believing in the Power of Prayer' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Kourtney Kardashian on Odom: 'Believing in the Power of Prayer'
text: Kourtney Kardashian has taken to her Instagram account amid Lamar Odom ‘s hospitalization. “Believing in the power of prayer for this beautiful soul,” the 36-year-old reality star wrote on her Instagram, along with a photo of Lamar with her son Mason. Kourtney joined her family in Las Vegas to be with Lamar. Kim Kardashian , Kris Jenner, [...] »
